about: Community-contributed instructions, prompts, and configurations to help you make the most of GitHub Copilot.
summary:
```markdown
## 1. Core Content of the Project and Key Problems Solved

**Core Content:**  
"Awesome GitHub Copilot" is a community-driven open-source project designed to enhance the functionality and user experience of GitHub Copilot through custom prompts, instructions, and chat modes. It provides developers with a reusable, extensible toolkit for AI-powered programming assistance.

**Problems Addressed:**  
- **Limited Default Capabilities of Copilot**: While powerful out-of-the-box, native GitHub Copilot lacks contextual awareness and domain-specific expertise in scenarios such as writing READMEs, adhering to team coding standards, or performing security audits.
- **Lack of Standardized Prompt Engineering**: Developers often rewrite similar natural language commands for common tasks, leading to inefficiency.
- **Difficulty Scaling Best Practices**: Different projects or tech stacks require distinct coding styles and conventions, but Copilot cannot automatically adapt to these variations.
- **Absence of Role-Based AI Assistance**: Standard chat interactions fail to simulate deep engagement with specialized roles like architects, DBAs, or security experts.

This project addresses these gaps by offering a structured configuration system that enables developers to quickly access high-quality, scenario-specific, and role-based AI assistance—boosting both development efficiency and code quality.

---

## 2. Breakthroughs and Innovations of the Project

### ✅ Summary of Innovations:

1. **Modular and Reusable AI Prompt Library**  
   Common programming tasks are abstracted into `.prompt.md` files for plug-and-play use—for example, `/awesome-copilot create-readme` instantly generates professional READMEs.

2. **File-Type-Based Automatic Instruction Injection**  
   Automatically loads best-practice rules based on file types (e.g., `.ts`, `.py`, `Dockerfile`), enabling "seamless enhancement"—developers receive context-aware,规范-compliant suggestions without manual intervention.

3. **Role-Based AI Chat Modes (Personas)**  
   Introduces an “expert persona” mechanism; for instance, activating the “Security Expert” mode makes Copilot provide advice from a security engineer’s perspective, significantly improving accuracy in domain-specific queries.

4. **Thematic Collections (Bundled Packages)**  
   Offers curated bundles like “Frontend Development Kit” or “Microservices Architecture Guide,” making it easy for teams to import and manage standardized tooling collectively.

5. **MCP Server Integration Solution**  
   Leverages Dockerized MCP (Model Context Protocol) servers to distribute customized content across editors, lowering adoption barriers and promoting ecosystem standardization.

6. **Fully Community-Driven & Contributor-Friendly**  
   All resources are open, following the All-Contributors standard, encouraging global developers to co-create and share knowledge—a sustainable platform for collective intelligence.

---

## 3. Promising Startup Ideas Based on This Project

Here are **5 highly feasible entrepreneurial opportunities** inspired by this project's potential:

### 🚀 Startup Idea 1: Enterprise Copilot Policy Management Center (SaaS Platform)  
> **Positioning**: A centralized platform helping enterprises manage and deploy private GitHub Copilot customization policies at scale.

- Features:
  - Auto-package internal coding standards into Instructions
  - Audit logs to track AI-generated code compliance
  - Multi-team permission control + private prompt library hosting
  - CI/CD integration for automated “AI compliance checks”
- Target Customers: Mid-to-large tech firms, fintech, health IT—industries with strict code consistency requirements.

💡 Competitive Edge: Elevates an open-source tool into an enterprise governance solution, filling a gap left by GitHub’s native offerings.

---

### 🧠 Startup Idea 2: Vertical-Specific AI Coding Assistant Marketplace  
> **Positioning**: An “App Store” for AI programming plugins focused on niche technical domains.

- Example Products:
  - “React Performance Optimization Expert” chat mode
  - “Python Data Science Best Practices” instruction pack
  - “Blockchain Smart Contract Auditor” prompt suite
- Freemium model: Free trials + paid subscriptions for premium packs
- Creator revenue-sharing to incentivize high-quality contributions

💡 Clear monetization path; leverages Awesome Copilot’s open format to rapidly build an ecosystem.

---

### 🛠️ Startup Idea 3: Low-Code/No-Code Platform Plugin with Copilot Integration  
> **Positioning**: Bring AI code completion capabilities to users of low-code platforms like Webflow, Bubble, or Retool.

- Use prompts/instructions from Awesome Copilot to create “logic block generators” tailored for low-code environments
- Example: User types “Send welcome email and log activity when user logs in” → system auto-generates corresponding JS snippet
- Sold as standalone plugins for existing low-code user bases

💡 Addresses a key weakness of low-code tools—handling complex logic—and enhances platform competitiveness.

---

### 📚 Startup Idea 4: Interactive AI Coding Education Platform + Sandbox  
> **Positioning**: An immersive learning platform for beginners, deeply integrating educational chat modes from Awesome Copilot.

- Sample Scenarios:
  - Learner selects “JavaScript Beginner Mode”—AI explains concepts in simple terms
  - On incorrect code input, AI guides thinking instead of directly fixing
  - Pre-built collections like “Algorithm Bootcamp” or “Full-Stack Project Lab”
- Built-in online IDE using VS Code Web for sandboxed practice

💡 Combines education, AI, and open-source resources—ideal for both consumer (ToC) and institutional (ToB) markets, including universities.

---

### 🔐 Startup Idea 5: AI-Powered Security Compliance Scanning & Hardening Service  
> **Positioning**: Automated code risk detection service built on security-focused instructions and chat modes from Awesome Copilot.

- Core Features:
  - Scan repositories for security violations (e.g., hardcoded secrets, SQL injection risks)
  - Generate fix recommendations and leverage Copilot to complete repair code
  - Export audit reports compliant with SOC2, ISO27001, etc.
- Seamless integration into DevSecOps pipelines

💡 Capitalizes on the growing intersection of AI and cybersecurity—ideal for fast-growing cloud-native and SaaS companies.

---
```

> 💡 **One-Sentence Strategic Insight**:  
> "Awesome GitHub Copilot" is more than just a toolset—it’s emerging as **core infrastructure for AI-native development workflows**. Building **specialized, commercial, and enterprise-grade services** around it represents a vast, untapped blue-ocean opportunity.
text:
🤖 Awesome GitHub Copilot Customizations
A curated collection of prompts, instructions, and chat modes to supercharge your GitHub Copilot experience across different domains, languages, and use cases.
🚀 What is Awesome GitHub Copilot?
This repository provides a comprehensive toolkit for enhancing GitHub Copilot with specialized:
- Focused, task-specific prompts for generating code, documentation, and solving specific problems
- Comprehensive coding standards and best practices that apply to specific file patterns or entire projects
- Specialized AI personas and conversation modes for different roles and contexts
- Curated collections of related prompts, instructions, and chat modes organized around specific themes and workflows
MCP Server
To make it easy to add these customizations to your editor, we have created a
MCP Server
that provides a prompt for searching and installing prompts, instructions, and chat modes directly from this repository. You'll need to have Docker installed and running to run the server.
Show MCP Server JSON configuration
{
"servers"
: {
"awesome-copilot"
: {
"type"
:
"
stdio
"
,
"command"
:
"
docker
"
,
"args"
: [
"
run
"
,
"
-i
"
,
"
--rm
"
,
"
ghcr.io/microsoft/mcp-dotnet-samples/awesome-copilot:latest
"
]
    }
  }
}
🔧 How to Use
🎯 Prompts
Use the
/
command in GitHub Copilot Chat to access prompts:
/awesome-copilot create-readme
📋 Instructions
Instructions automatically apply to files based on their patterns and provide contextual guidance for coding standards, frameworks, and best practices.
💭 Chat Modes
Activate chat modes to get specialized assistance from AI personas tailored for specific roles like architects, DBAs, or security experts.
🤝 Contributing
We welcome contributions! Please see our
Contributing Guidelines
for details on how to:
Add new prompts, instructions, or chat modes
Improve existing content
Report issues or suggest enhancements
Quick Contribution Guide
Follow our file naming conventions and frontmatter requirements
Test your contributions thoroughly
Update the appropriate README tables
Submit a pull request with a clear description
📖 Repository Structure
├── prompts/          # Task-specific prompts (.prompt.md)
├── instructions/     # Coding standards and best practices (.instructions.md)
├── chatmodes/        # AI personas and specialized modes (.chatmode.md)
├── collections/      # Curated collections of related items (.collection.yml)
└── scripts/          # Utility scripts for maintenance
🌟 Getting Started
Browse the Collections
: Check out our comprehensive lists of
prompts
,
instructions
,
chat modes
, and
collections
.
Add to your editor
: Click the "Install" button to install to VS Code, or copy the file contents for other editors.
Start Using
: Copy prompts to use with
/
commands, let instructions enhance your coding experience, or activate chat modes for specialized assistance.
📄 License
This project is licensed under the MIT License - see the
LICENSE
file for details.
🛡️ Security & Support
Security Issues
: Please see our
Security Policy
Support
: Check our
Support Guide
for getting help
Code of Conduct
: We follow the
Contributor Covenant
🎯 Why Use Awesome GitHub Copilot?
Productivity
: Pre-built prompts and instructions save time and provide consistent results
Best Practices
: Benefit from community-curated coding standards and patterns
Specialized Assistance
: Access expert-level guidance through specialized chat modes
Continuous Learning
: Stay updated with the latest patterns and practices across technologies
Ready to supercharge your coding experience?
Start exploring our
prompts
,
instructions
, and
chat modes
!
Contributors ✨
Thanks goes to these wonderful people (
emoji key
):

readme:
# 🤖 Awesome GitHub Copilot Customizations [![Powered by Awesome Copilot](https://img.shields.io/badge/Powered_by-Awesome_Copilot-blue?logo=githubcopilot)](https://aka.ms/awesome-github-copilot) [![All Contributors](https://img.shields.io/badge/all_contributors-86-orange.svg?style=flat-square)](#contributors-) A curated collection of prompts, instructions, and chat modes to supercharge your GitHub Copilot experience across different domains, languages, and use cases. ## 🚀 What is Awesome GitHub Copilot? This repository provides a comprehensive toolkit for enhancing GitHub Copilot with specialized: - **[![Awesome Prompts](https://img.shields.io/badge/Awesome-Prompts-blue?logo=githubcopilot)](README.prompts.md)** - Focused, task-specific prompts for generating code, documentation, and solving specific problems - **[![Awesome Instructions](https://img.shields.io/badge/Awesome-Instructions-blue?logo=githubcopilot)](README.instructions.md)** - Comprehensive coding standards and best practices that apply to specific file patterns or entire projects - **[![Awesome Chat Modes](https://img.shields.io/badge/Awesome-Chat_Modes-blue?logo=githubcopilot)](README.chatmodes.md)** - Specialized AI personas and conversation modes for different roles and contexts - **[![Awesome Collections](https://img.shields.io/badge/Awesome-Collections-blue?logo=githubcopilot)](README.collections.md)** - Curated collections of related prompts, instructions, and chat modes organized around specific themes and workflows ## MCP Server To make it easy to add these customizations to your editor, we have created a [MCP Server](https://developer.microsoft.com/blog/announcing-awesome-copilot-mcp-server) that provides a prompt for searching and installing prompts, instructions, and chat modes directly from this repository. You'll need to have Docker installed and running to run the server. [![Install in VS Code](https://img.shields.io/badge/VS_Code-Install-0098FF?logo=visualstudiocode&logoColor=white)](https://aka.ms/awesome-copilot/mcp/vscode) [![Install in VS Code Insiders](https://img.shields.io/badge/VS_Code_Insiders-Install-24bfa5?logo=visualstudiocode&logoColor=white)](https://aka.ms/awesome-copilot/mcp/vscode-insiders) [![Install in Visual Studio](https://img.shields.io/badge/Visual_Studio-Install-C16FDE?logo=visualstudio&logoColor=white)](https://aka.ms/awesome-copilot/mcp/vs)
Show MCP Server JSON configuration ```json { "servers": { "awesome-copilot": { "type": "stdio", "command": "docker", "args": [ "run", "-i", "--rm", "ghcr.io/microsoft/mcp-dotnet-samples/awesome-copilot:latest" ] } } } ```
## 🔧 How to Use ### 🎯 Prompts Use the `/` command in GitHub Copilot Chat to access prompts: ``` /awesome-copilot create-readme ``` ### 📋 Instructions Instructions automatically apply to files based on their patterns and provide contextual guidance for coding standards, frameworks, and best practices. ### 💭 Chat Modes Activate chat modes to get specialized assistance from AI personas tailored for specific roles like architects, DBAs, or security experts. ## 🤝 Contributing We welcome contributions! Please see our [Contributing Guidelines](CONTRIBUTING.md) for details on how to: - Add new prompts, instructions, or chat modes - Improve existing content - Report issues or suggest enhancements ### Quick Contribution Guide 1. Follow our file naming conventions and frontmatter requirements 2. Test your contributions thoroughly 3. Update the appropriate README tables 4. Submit a pull request with a clear description ## 📖 Repository Structure ``` ├── prompts/ # Task-specific prompts (.prompt.md) ├── instructions/ # Coding standards and best practices (.instructions.md) ├── chatmodes/ # AI personas and specialized modes (.chatmode.md) ├── collections/ # Curated collections of related items (.collection.yml) └── scripts/ # Utility scripts for maintenance ``` ## 🌟 Getting Started 1. **Browse the Collections**: Check out our comprehensive lists of [prompts](README.prompts.md), [instructions](README.instructions.md), [chat modes](README.chatmodes.md), and [collections](README.collections.md). 2. **Add to your editor**: Click the "Install" button to install to VS Code, or copy the file contents for other editors. 3. **Start Using**: Copy prompts to use with `/` commands, let instructions enhance your coding experience, or activate chat modes for specialized assistance. ## 📄 License This project is licensed under the MIT License - see the [LICENSE](LICENSE) file for details. ## 🛡️ Security & Support - **Security Issues**: Please see our [Security Policy](SECURITY.md) - **Support**: Check our [Support Guide](SUPPORT.md) for getting help - **Code of Conduct**: We follow the [Contributor Covenant](CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md) ## 🎯 Why Use Awesome GitHub Copilot? - **Productivity**: Pre-built prompts and instructions save time and provide consistent results - **Best Practices**: Benefit from community-curated coding standards and patterns - **Specialized Assistance**: Access expert-level guidance through specialized chat modes - **Continuous Learning**: Stay updated with the latest patterns and practices across technologies --- **Ready to supercharge your coding experience?** Start exploring our [prompts](README.prompts.md), [instructions](README.instructions.md), and [chat modes](README.chatmodes.md)! ## Contributors ✨ Thanks goes to these wonderful people ([emoji key](https://allcontributors.org/docs/en/emoji-key)):

Aaron Powell

This project follows the [all-contributors](https://github.com/all-contributors/all-contributors) specification. Contributions of any kind welcome! ## 📚 Additional Resources - [VS Code Copilot Customization Documentation](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/copilot/copilot-customization) - Official Microsoft documentation - [GitHub Copilot Chat Documentation](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/copilot/chat/copilot-chat) - Complete chat feature guide - [Custom Chat Modes](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/copilot/chat/chat-modes) - Advanced chat configuration - [VS Code Settings](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/getstarted/settings) - General VS Code configuration guide ## ™️ Trademarks This project may contain trademarks or logos for projects, products, or services. Authorized use of Microsoft trademarks or logos is subject to and must follow [Microsoft's Trademark & Brand Guidelines](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/legal/intellectualproperty/trademarks/usage/general). Use of Microsoft trademarks or logos in modified versions of this project must not cause confusion or imply Microsoft sponsorship. Any use of third-party trademarks or logos are subject to those third-party's policies.
